medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started 2.5 days ago in the periumbilical area and has slowly migrated to the right lower quadrant (RLQ). The pain has worsened over the day leading to the patient presenting to the emergency department for further evaluation. The patient has never experienced this type of pain before. There are no reports of fevers, chills, nausea, emesis, diarrhea, or anorexia.
medical_history.family_history: Father has a history of prostate cancer; otherwise, family history is non-contributory. No history of colon cancer or inflammatory bowel disease (IBD).
